author: Rakhim Davletkaliyev
review: Brief and useful guide to setting up environment for learning english. No grammar rules, only methods, concepts and ideas to experiment with.
title: Learning English

author: Barbara Oakley
review: Good overview of effective learning approaches. Read it along with course “Learning How To Learn” on Coursera, the book complements it nicely.
title: A Mind for Numbers: How to Excel at Math and Science (Even If You Flunked Algebra)
